entry.title: New GOOD 2025 schedule released (0.33)
entry.summary:
A new GOOD 2025 schedule has been released!

We released a new schedule version!

We had to move some sessions, so if you were planning on seeing them, check their new dates or locations:

  • “Developer Forum” by Alan Chalker [Ohio Supercomputer Center], Julie Ma [Massachusetts Green High Performance Computing Center], Emily Moffat Sadeghi [Ohio Supercomputer Center], Travis Ravert [Ohio Supercomputer Center], Jeff Ohrstrom [Ohio Supercomputer Center] (Belfer Case Study Room (CGIS S020) → Tsai Auditorium (CGIS S010))
  • “Developer Forum (Breakout Session)” (Lee Conference Room (CGIS S030) → Belfer Case Study Room (CGIS S020))
  • “Developer Forum (Breakout Session)” (Kang Conference Room (CGIS S050) → Lee Conference Room (CGIS S030))

entry.title: New GOOD 2025 schedule released (0.24)
entry.summary:
A new GOOD 2025 schedule has been released!

We released a new schedule version!

We had to move some sessions, so if you were planning on seeing them, check their new dates or locations:

  • “From 0 to OOD: How to install Open On Demand with Keycloak and Slurm integration.” by Edwin Berbesi [Queen's University] (March 18, 2025, 8 a.m. → March 18, 2025, 8:30 a.m.)
  • “Growing Open OnDemand: Leveraging Unified Community Knowledge (GOODLUCK) – A Deeper Dive” (March 18, 2025, 4:30 p.m. → March 18, 2025, 5 p.m.)
  • “Extending Functionality with Initializers” by Huston Rogers [Mississippi State University] (March 18, 2025, 10 a.m. → March 18, 2025, 10:30 a.m.)
  • “Developer Forum (Breakout Sessions)” (March 18, 2025, 2:30 p.m. → March 18, 2025, 3 p.m.)
  • “Maximizing your AI Infrastructure Utilization with Open OnDemand and GPU Fractionalization” by Chris Simmons [Cambridge Computer] (March 18, 2025, 1:30 p.m. → March 18, 2025, 2 p.m.)
  • “Developer Forum (Breakout Sessions)” (March 18, 2025, 2:30 p.m. → March 18, 2025, 3 p.m.)
  • “Scaling up OOD - a sysadmin's perspective” by Simon Westersund [CSC - IT Center for Science] (March 18, 2025, 4 p.m., Belfer Case Study Room (CGIS S020) → March 18, 2025, 4:30 p.m., Tsai Auditorium (CGIS S010))
  • “Lessons Learned from 8 Years of Open OnDemand at Princeton Research Computing” by Josko Plazonic [Princeton], Jonathan Halverson [Princeton], Irene Kopaliani [Princeton] (March 18, 2025, 2 p.m. → March 18, 2025, 2:30 p.m.)
  • “A GOOD Start: Open OnDemand’s Past, Present, and Future” by Alan Chalker [Ohio Supercomputer Center] (March 18, 2025, 12:30 p.m. → March 18, 2025, 1 p.m.)
  • “Integrating XDMoD with OnDemand” by Dori Sajdak [University at Buffalo] (March 18, 2025, 8 a.m. → March 18, 2025, 8:30 a.m.)
  • “Federated Open OnDemand” by Robin Karlsson [CSC - IT Center for Science] (March 18, 2025, 3:30 p.m., Belfer Case Study Room (CGIS S020) → March 18, 2025, 4 p.m., Tsai Auditorium (CGIS S010))
  • “Bringing AI tools to Open OnDemand to boost coding efficiency” by Wei Feinstein [Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory] (March 18, 2025, 2 p.m. → March 18, 2025, 2:30 p.m.)
  • “Creating and Deploying Singularity-Based Web Applications on Open OnDemand” by Kyriakos Tsoukalas [Colgate University] (March 18, 2025, 4 p.m., Tsai Auditorium (CGIS S010) → March 18, 2025, 4:30 p.m., Belfer Case Study Room (CGIS S020))
  • “Deploying a user-facing system status application with NextJS and OOD” by Johnathan Lee [Arizona State University] (March 18, 2025, 10 a.m. → March 18, 2025, 10:30 a.m.)
  • “Attendee Social at Fenway Park” (Tsai Auditorium (CGIS S010) → CGIS Concourse)
  • “Fungible Slurm clusters with Open OnDemand and Azure CycleCloud” by Xavier Pillons [Microsoft] (Belfer Case Study Room (CGIS S020) → Tsai Auditorium (CGIS S010))
  • “Open OnDemand @ Harvard IQSS” by Len Wisniewski [Harvard] (March 18, 2025, 1 p.m. → March 18, 2025, 1:30 p.m.)
  • “Microsoft Windows through OOD: easy, fast, secure, and scalable” by Dean Anderson [Brigham Young University] (Tsai Auditorium (CGIS S010) → Belfer Case Study Room (CGIS S020))
  • “Developer Forum (Breakout Sessions)” (March 18, 2025, 2:30 p.m. → March 18, 2025, 3 p.m.)
  • “Deploying LLM web applications on Open OnDemand: experiences at Perth Children's Hospital” by Harry Smallbone [University of Western Australia], Thomas Drake-Brockman [Perth Children's Hospital] (March 18, 2025, 3:30 p.m., Tsai Auditorium (CGIS S010) → March 18, 2025, 4 p.m., Belfer Case Study Room (CGIS S020))

entry.title: New GOOD 2025 schedule released (0.3)
entry.summary:
A new GOOD 2025 schedule has been released!

We released a new schedule version!

We have new sessions!

  • “Using OpenOnDemand for Teaching”

  • “Bringing AI tools to Open OnDemand to boost coding efficiency”

  • “HPC Adult Coloring Book BOF”
  • “A Simplified Approach to Managing Your Data With Globus”
